comments.author: shasan
comments.body: I think any user should not make any type of deal regarding financial transactions whether that is for any reversible payment and/or any type of account buy as the user can do anything to scam. The OP has already negative trust as well as the user deleted posts and activity is lower than the merit count. It become only to get attention all the merit received from airdrop so there is no chance to be more merit than activity. The account might be already sold too and post can be deleted to remove the evidence.
